translation.en: -[man 2] Incoming! -[man 3] What the hell!
-[man 3] Let me go! -[woman 1] No! No!
-[man 4] Go, go, go! -[man 5] Come on, come on! Come on!
-[man 5] Clear! Clear! -[man 6] Hey, to the left.
[man 1] There she is, take her.
I mean, I miss my family and all that shit, of course, but...
translation.ko: "제네스코프 그래픽 노블인 '헬싱'에서 영감을 받음" 가족이나 뭐 그런 거 말이야 솔직히...

translation.en: It's just the little things.
Going to Subway for lunch.
[chuckles] Double meat on my sandwich.
Just because.
Yeah...
I don't know, man.
-I'm just talking. -[slurping]
Which you're probably pretty sick of by now, right?
Yeah, that's okay. Go ahead.
-[snarls] -Yeah.
Yeah, that's it, Doc. Drink up.
translation.ko: 잘하고 있어, 박사 쭉 빨아 먹어

translation.en: That's good.
[sighs] I'd be fed up if I was you too.
-[sighs] -I mean, it's not your fault.
Oh, yeah, and Kit Kats. [laughs] I miss Kit Kats.
That little chocolate candy with the cookie thing in the middle
and it goes snap when you break them. [clicks tongue]
I miss Kit Kats.
Probably a ton of them out there too, just sitting there in stores.
translation.ko: 가게에 쌓여 있는 녀석들도 사람이 그리울 거야

translation.en: Might as well be on the other side of the moon all the good it does me in here.
translation.ko: 생각해 보면 내가 여기 있는 게 다행이지

translation.en: -Hey, whoa. Hey, easy there. -[snarls]
translation.ko: 이봐, 잠깐만 너무 세게 빨지 마

translation.en: Oi, just about drained me dry today, Doc.
Oh, shit.
There's something dicking around down by the southwest entrance.
translation.ko: 남서쪽 입구에 뭔가 걸리적거리는 게 있군

translation.en: Goddamn it.
[laughs] They're coming.
-So I'm gonna take care of it. -They're coming!
-You just relax, Doc. I got this. -They're coming. They're coming.
translation.ko: - 걱정 말고 나한테 맡겨 - 드디어 왔어!

translation.en: -They're coming! [laughs] -Goddamn apocalypse.
They're coming! They're coming!
They're coming! [laughs]
[woman 1] Please, let us in!
[woman 2] Open the door! Please, let us in!
Open this door!
-Goddamn it, open the goddamn door! -[woman 2] Help us! Let us in!
translation.ko: - 제발요 - 안에 있는 거 알아요! - 문 좀 열라고요! - 도와주세요! - 살려 주세요! - 빨리 열어요

translation.en: [woman 1] Do it! Hurry up!
Come on, hurry! Hurry, let us in!
translation.ko: - 어서 문 좀 열어요 - 미안하지만 안 됩니다

translation.en: -I can't let you in here, I'm sorry. -Just open the door!
translation.ko: - 어서 문 좀 열어요 - 미안하지만 안 됩니다 그러지 말고 저희 좀 들여보내 줘요

translation.en: -You have to let us in! -Do not attempt to open the door.
translation.ko: 그러지 말고 저희 좀 들여보내 줘요 폭탄을 설치해놨으니까 강제로 열 생각은 말아요

translation.en: It's booby-trapped. You will not succeed.
translation.ko: 폭탄을 설치해놨으니까 강제로 열 생각은 말아요

translation.en: -No! Let us in! -Come on!
I'm a United States Marine,
and I've been ordered to guard this facility.
I can't compromise my mission. I'm sorry.
-Open the door, Marine, goddamn it! -We're gonna die out here!
translation.ko: - 젠장, 당장 문 열지 못해! - 이러다 죽겠어요

translation.en: -Ted? -Yes, it's me, asshole!
-Open the door! That's a direct order! -[woman 1] Hurry, open this door!
Let us in this place!
Please, open this door! We'll die out here!
-They're coming! -You gotta let us in!
-Go, go, go! Move! -Go, go!
-[Ted] Get inside now! -Wendy!
-To me! -John!
-Wendy! -Get your ass in here!
-[Ted] John! -[John] Wendy!
-[Ted] John! -Get your ass inside now.
-Go. Go. Go. -[John] Wendy!
Go.
[Ted] All right, go, go, go!
Come on, let's go! Let's go! Inside, inside!
Thank you. [pants]
Thank you.
-What's up with that guy? -Oh, that's Sam.
Don't worry about thanking him, the guy's deaf. He can't hear you.
translation.ko: 아무리 얘기해도 소용없어요 귀가 안 들리시거든요

translation.en: [John] Wendy! Did she make it?
-I thought she was with you? -No, she was right behind me.
translation.ko: - 당신이랑 안 왔어요? - 아냐, 내 뒤에 있었어

translation.en: [John] Wendy!
Wendy!
-Oh, that was some serious... -[John] Wendy!
I'll explain it all when we're alone. -Roger that. -[chuckles]
translation.ko: - 단둘이 있을 때 말해 줄게 - 알겠습니다

translation.en: You make that yourself? It's very crafty.
translation.ko: 그건 직접 만든 거야? 아주 감쪽같군

translation.en: Oh, I am seriously glad you're still here.
translation.ko: 자네가 아직 있어서 어찌나 기쁜지 몰라!

translation.en: -[scoffs] You smell like gas, brother. -[laughs]
Hey, my wife's out there.
I thought she got in, but she got lost in the fray.
translation.ko: 들어온 줄 알았는데 난리 통에 흩어졌나 봐

translation.en: -We gotta go get her. -Nothing I can do about that, I'm sorry.
translation.ko: - 가서 데려와야 해 - 죄송하지만 방법이 없어요

translation.en: What are you talking about? A woman is stuck out there.
She's gonna get torn apart by those things.
Opening those doors will compromise this facility
translation.ko: 저 문을 열면 이 시설뿐 아니라

translation.en: and everything about our mission.
-It's not gonna happen. -John!
-Hey. -John? John!
Everybody upstairs now.
End of discussion.
[Ted] Thanks for changing the codes on that door.
[Marine] Hey, you were gone for six months. -Bastard. -[Marine laughs]
Just be grateful I've still got the UV lights up and running.
translation.ko: 자외선 탐지기라도 작동 중인 게 어디예요

translation.en: You know, I never even made it back to the base.
I got cut off, tracked, chased all over hell.
Hey, the other guys...
translation.ko: 다른 친구들은 어때? 고메즈나 스미티는 돌아왔나?

translation.en: -Gomez, Smitty, they make it back? -No.
translation.ko: 다른 친구들은 어때? 고메즈나 스미티는 돌아왔나? 아뇨

translation.en: -I should have stayed put. -Yeah, maybe.
translation.ko: - 꼼짝 않는 게 좋겠군 - 그럴지도 모르죠

translation.en: Yeah. What about you? You're doing okay here? Oh, buddy, a barrel of laughs.
translation.ko: - 자네는 여기서 지낼 만했나? - 그럼요, 웃을 일 천지죠

translation.en: Yeah, I bet. [sighs]
Is she still...?
Oh, yeah, she's still whatever she is. Sleeping Beauty.
translation.ko: 네, 아주 한결같아요 잠자는 미녀가 따로 없죠

translation.en: So just you and the doc, hmm? This whole time, hmm?
-Uh, you'll see. -Huh? Yeah?
Okay, almost there.
[Ted] I love what you've done with the place.
-[marine] Whoa, whoa, it's okay. -Jesus, he's got a pet one.
-It's okay. It's okay. -Is that the doc? Oh, my God.
translation.ko: - 괴물을 키우다니! - 괜찮으니 진정해요 설마 저게 박사인가? 세상에...

translation.en: Yeah, she got bit. And then I've just been--
Oh, this ought to be good.
Hey, she was part of this mission too, smartass.
-Wasn't she? -Yeah, but, uh--
-Jesus. -[marine] Well, all right then.
Anybody touches her, I'll throw them off the roof.
translation.ko: 손끝 하나라도 건드리면 밖으로 던져 버릴 겁니다

translation.en: -She's been bit. -She's a vampire.
And what about this chick?
This "chick"...
doesn't exist as far as you're concerned.
translation.ko: 없는 셈 치세요 신경 쓰지 마시라고요

translation.en: You understand me?
-I said, do you understand me? -[kid] Yeah.
Okay then.
That's good.
[woman 1] Do you think we're safe in here, huh?
With one of those things penned up and then some--
translation.ko: 괴물 하나가 갇혀 있고 또 다른 방에는...

translation.en: I don't even know what, in that other room.
[woman 2] It's true.
Plus, look how he's treated John's wife. I mean, he's an animal.
translation.ko: 게다가 존 씨 부인 일도 그래 완전히 짐승이 따로 없잖아

translation.en: You leave a guy in a cage, he becomes an animal.
translation.ko: 이런 데 처박혀 있었으니 제정신일 리가 없지

translation.en: [woman 3] Okay, shh... He's an animal with a machine gun.
[woman 1] Oh, please. You know he's feeding her, right?
translation.ko: 정신 차려 자기 피까지 먹인 거 알지?

translation.en: That vampire? He's actually feeding her his own blood.
translation.ko: 그 뱀파이어한테 말이야 자기 피를 먹이고 있다니까

translation.en: [John] Hey there, soldier man.
Axel, right?
[sniffs] Your name, I mean.
Come on, man, I'm trying.
Okay, great. Well, look, uh...
Ugh, I'm sorry about what happened earlier. Obviously, I was a little--
translation.ko: 아무튼 아까 일은 미안해 그때는 내가 좀...

translation.en: But my-my wife's out there.
-Yeah, she was. -Yeah. You gotta help me.
Let me out there. I don't care what happens to me.
translation.ko: 어떻게 되든 상관없으니 나라도 밖으로 보내 줘

translation.en: I don't, but my wife's stuck out there.
I already told you, we're not opening those doors again.
translation.ko: 말씀드렸잖아요 문은 절대로 열 수 없어요

translation.en: It's too dangerous. It's suicide out there.
You know what it's like. You've been out there.
Listen to me.
Listen! I need to get out there!
It's not gonna happen.
Enough! Enough.
-Now I get how you feel, I do. -[grunts]
But there is nothing that we can do for her.
translation.ko: 하지만 부인을 위해 할 수 있는 건 하나도 없어요

translation.en: -[grunts] All right! -So we stay inside.
translation.ko: 하지만 부인을 위해 할 수 있는 건 하나도 없어요 - 알겠네 - 여기에 있어야 해요

translation.en: [grunts] All right.
-All right. -[sighs]
End of discussion.
Oh, I can't believe the doc.
-Well, she was always... -Yeah.
Six months now.
It happened right when you and the boys headed out.
What?
I was giving you covering fire. She, um...
translation.ko: 제가 원사님 엄호 사격할 때 박사가...

translation.en: Yeah, no, I remember. You were up on the roof.
Yeah.
She went down to make sure the door got shut behind you.
translation.ko: 원사님 나가시고 문 닫힌 걸 확인하겠다고 갔어요

translation.en: I told her she didn't have to do it, but she insisted.
translation.ko: 그럴 필요 없다고 했는데 기어코 갔죠

translation.en: And then... You know, when all hell broke loose, and you guys were getting picked off...
translation.ko: 하필 그때 놈들이 탈출해서 마구 달려들었고요

translation.en: She tried to help Smitty get back inside, and one of them...
got a hold of her, took a chunk out of her arm.
She turned right after that.
Damn.
Yeah, pretty much.
[Ted] It's just-- It's gonna be a tough sell,
convincing some of those people to live in the same place as one of those things.
translation.ko: 뱀파이어랑 같은 공간에 있으라고 설득하는 일 말이야

translation.en: [Axel] I'm not convincing nobody of nothing.
-And I never said they were staying. -That's very true, you did not.
translation.ko: - 여기 있으라고 한 적도 없고요 - 그건 그래, 안 그랬지

translation.en: Look, I'll give you the door codes later, a set of keys.
Maybe a couple of the others when I feel like I can trust them.
translation.ko: 다른 사람들이 어느 정도 믿을 만하다 싶으면요

translation.en: Yeah, that's a good idea. We're gonna need all the help we can get,
translation.ko: 그래, 잘 생각했네 우리는 도움이 절실하거든

translation.en: although some of them have been acting up, especially with that John guy.
translation.ko: 비협조적인 사람이 문제지 특히 존 말이야

translation.en: Don't-- Watch that there.
And this here, this bad boy's new.
Damn, you're like Robinson Crusoe or some shit. [sniffs]
translation.ko: 세상에, 완전히 로빈슨 크루소가 따로 없네

translation.en: How did you hook up with that crew?
Oh, hiding in holes in basements and anywhere you can think of.
translation.ko: 지하실 구석이든 어디든 안 숨어 본 데가 없어

translation.en: You find another frightened fish, and then you just decide to throw them together.
translation.ko: 같은 처지끼리 만났으니 한데 뭉치게 된 거지

translation.en: You know, you're running. You're always running.
Ferals chasing you like wild animals.
And the feeders, smarter. Tracking you down.
You don't know what it's like out there. You have no idea.
translation.ko: 자네는 바깥세상이 어떤지 감히 짐작도 못 해

translation.en: A person will do anything, for just one more day. Anything.
translation.ko: 사람들은 하루라도 더 살려고 무슨 짓이든 할 거야

translation.en: Well, damn it, Robinson Crusoe! Robinson!
Now, while they're not here.
Kill the other one too.
-Yeah, let's do it. -Hell, yes.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Back up, people. This is not a petting zoo.
Who are you supposed to be? Shaka Zulu?
-In charge, that's what. -Yeah? -Until the army guy comes back. -[roars]
translation.ko: 군인 아저씨가 오기 전까지 제가 책임자예요

translation.en: -Yeah, that's right. You're real tough. -Try me, ass face.
translation.ko: 그래, 용감하기도 하지 덤벼 봐요, 못생긴 형씨

translation.en: Get out of my fucking way now.
What?
-[feral snarling] -[Axel] Incoming!
-Everybody, get out of here! -[Ted] Let's go!
-Get up! Move! -Sam, Sam, Sam. Vampires swarming.
-[Ted] Heads up! -Come on, let's go!
-[screams] -Clear! Clear!
-[Karen] No! -[laughs]
-[Karen] No! John, please, help me! -I'm sorry.
-No! -I'm sorry.
-I'm sorry! [sobs] -[Doc laughing]
I'm sorry! [screams]
Dylan. [pants]
[sobs] Who the hell are you?
Oh... Oh, goddamn it.
That's disgusting. Oh, Jesus.
I can't believe you're still dumping them in there.
-[Axel] You two wanna go grab the others? -[sighs]
[sniffles] Thank you.
You know, my parents were in Hawaii with my brother when it happened.
translation.ko: 그 일이 있었을 때 부모님과 남동생은 하와이에 있었어요

translation.en: I was supposed to go too.
I lied...
and said I had a midterm.
I was seeing this guy.
I'm sorry.
I was never like this before. It was--
I keep trying to get it together.
But what if I can't?
-Nothing broken or busted. -Shit.
translation.ko: - 부서지거나 고장 난 건 없네요 - 젠장

translation.en: -They didn't just push their way in. -[sighs] At least I don't think they did.
translation.ko: 그냥 밀고 들어온 게 아니에요 일단 제 생각은 그래요

translation.en: How many of the others did you give the codes to this door?
Well, probably more than I should have.
The black kid and the deaf guy...
If my bringing them here had anything to do with this, I'm sorry.
You know, I hate to say this, maybe we should toss them out right now
translation.ko: 이런 말 하긴 싫지만 당장 쫓아내는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: while we still have the chance and the firepower.
translation.ko: 기회가 있고 무기도 있을 때 말이야

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I hear you.
We gotta protect Sleeping Beauty.
Well... I'm not so sure about that. She's pretty damn good at that on her own.
translation.ko: 그건 잘 모르겠네요 - 알아서 잘하던데요 - 응, 그건 그래

translation.en: Yeah, how about that, huh?
[woman] What are you, anyway?
Why are you here?
I'm... I was...
I don't know.
-I don't remember. -You don't remember
or you don't wanna tell me?
What happened?
-Why--? Where am I? -You were an animal last night.
translation.ko: - 여긴 어디예요? - 어제 당신은 짐승 같았어요

translation.en: Plus, you got bit by one of them and nothing happened.
Not yet, anyway. Maybe you're still gonna turn. Who knows?
translation.ko: 아직은 그렇지만 언제 변할지 알게 뭐예요?

translation.en: -I don't know what you're talking about. -Normal people don't react like that.
translation.ko: - 무슨 말씀인지 모르겠네요 - 보통 사람은 그러지 않죠

translation.en: So, what does that make you, huh? Seriously, what?
translation.ko: 근데 어떻게 그럴 수 있죠? 대체 뭐냐고요!

translation.en: -Back off. -What?
Look what happened to Karen. People are dying here because of you.
translation.ko: 캐런이 당한 거 봤잖아요 당신 때문에 다들 죽고 있어요

translation.en: I don't know what happened here.
I don't know where I am. I have a daughter, Dylan.
translation.ko: 여기가 어딘지도 몰라요 제겐 딜런이라는 딸이 있어요

translation.en: That's all I know or care about.
I'm sorry but we've all lost a lot while you've been here sleeping.
translation.ko: 안 됐지만 그쪽이 자는 동안 우린 많은 걸 잃었어요

translation.en: And this whole story of yours is just a little too weird.
translation.ko: 근데 그쪽이 하는 말은 너무 터무니없군요

translation.en: Back up.
Hey, hey, hey. All right, break it up.
[Axel] Hey, what did I tell you about this woman? Get out of here.
translation.ko: - 얼른! - 이 여자 신경 쓰인다고 했잖아요 여기서 당장 나가요!

translation.en: This is the reason we were attacked.
[Axel] You need to back the hell up and get the hell out of here now. Go!
Christ.
Here, I got you some, um, clothes.
Where's my daughter? Where's Dylan?
Uh, if you had a daughter and she's out there, she's... she's dead.
translation.ko: 설사 밖에 따님이 있다 해도 이미 죽었을 겁니다

translation.en: I'm sorry, but that's just a fact.
Look, he's just...
You know, he's been here a while and...
I don't know what happened to you.
The world went to shit a couple years ago.
translation.ko: 몇 년 전에 바깥세상이 난리가 났어요

translation.en: Years?
We're just all trying to get by.
I can help you get out of here.
So you can find your daughter. Just give me a chance to figure it out.
Axel, the other Marine, you know, he's okay.
He's just a little by the book and all that shit.
I'll help you out.
You don't gotta worry about me, lady.
I've seen everything you got for three years. I'm pretty much over you.
translation.ko: 3년 동안 당신을 지켜봤거든요 그래서 꽤 익숙해졌어요

translation.en: My name's Vanessa.
Okay... Vanessa.
Well... we don't got that much water, so it makes sense to double up on showers.
translation.ko: 물이 넉넉하지 않으니 샤워는 둘이서 같이 하죠

translation.en: You know, we turn it off when we're soaping up. That's the rule.
translation.ko: 비누칠할 때는 물을 잠그세요 그게 규칙이에요

translation.en: So can you tell me? What the hell happened to me?
translation.ko: 저한테 무슨 일이 생긴 건지 말해 줄 수 있나요?

translation.en: Please.
Look, I don't know what happened to you.
I didn't even know you had a daughter.
We got sent in here to pick up a dead body.
translation.ko: 시체를 처리하라는 명을 받고 여기로 온 거예요

translation.en: Then some volcano goes off in Wyoming, wipes out half the Western states.
translation.ko: 근데 와이오밍에서 화산이 폭발해 서부의 절반을 뒤덮었죠

translation.en: After that, people just started killing each other.
translation.ko: 그 뒤로 사람들이 서로를 죽이기 시작했고요

translation.en: People did?
Yeah, well, it makes you feel like an idiot to call them vampires,
translation.ko: 뱀파이어라고 하면 어이없다고 생각할 수도 있지만

translation.en: but they drink blood so, you know, you decide.
translation.ko: 피를 마시는 건 사실이니까 알아서 부르세요

translation.en: -And so you guys here, you were-- -Yeah, we got dropped in.
translation.ko: - 그럼 당신들은 여기에... - 네, 갇힌 셈이죠

translation.en: Half dozen of us got dumped off.
Our orders were to protect you and the doctor, that's all.
translation.ko: 저희는 당신과 박사를 지키라는 명령을 받았을 뿐입니다

translation.en: We were supposed to hold this position until we were relieved.
Folks have been calling this thing "The Rising".
Whatever it is.
I don't know.
I did my duty. I watched you.
translation.ko: 맡은 임무에 따라 곁에서 당신을 보호했고

translation.en: I kept the doc alive after she got bit. That's it.
But why me? Why would anybody be interested in me?
translation.ko: 왜 하필 저예요? 왜 저를 보호하라고 한 거죠?

translation.en: I always figured you'd tell me after you woke up.
translation.ko: 당신이 깨어나면 직접 말해 줄 거라 생각했어요

translation.en: It's gotta have something to do with this thing though.
It has to.
I have no idea.
I mean, I'm nothing special.
-Honest. -Well, somebody thought you were.
Looks like they were right.
If anybody knew, it was Doc, but... [sighs]
She said you should have died already.
That you were killed or... Then you weren't or you couldn't be.
translation.ko: 살해당했는데 안 죽었거나 못 죽은 거겠죠

translation.en: I don't know, man. I just watched you.
Let's go. Very slow, very quiet.
That's a hell of a way to say thank you, Vanessa.
-[Axel] Whoa, hey, hey. -[Ted] What's going on here?
Easy, easy, easy.
-[Vanessa] Shoot me if you want. -It's all good.
But I'm getting out of this place right now.
-I don't give a shit about what you do. -You're not gonna get 20 blocks
translation.ko: - 아무리 말려도 소용없어요 - 어차피 나가 봤자

translation.en: by yourself, I promise you.
-The man's got a point. -I'll take my chances.
-Hey. -Just...
I'll see if any of the others wanna come with me.
translation.ko: 그럼 같이 나갈 사람이 있나 물어볼게요

translation.en: You and the others, you're just gonna walk past all my booby traps?
translation.ko: 그래서 제가 곳곳에 설치한 폭탄을 뚫고 - 잠금장치도 알아서 열겠다고요? - 자, 그럼 이렇게 하지

translation.en: -You're gonna get through all the locks? -All right, this is what we're gonna do.
translation.ko: - 잠금장치도 알아서 열겠다고요? - 자, 그럼 이렇게 하지

translation.en: I'm gonna escort the little lady back to the lab.
translation.ko: 내가 이 여자를 실험실까지 데리고 갈 테니까

translation.en: Get some pants on and join us.
[sighs] All right, that suits me. Just everybody stay cool.
Let's go.
You okay?
Oh, okay, we gotta get some stuff together now.
-Food, water. We're gonna get out of here. -Fine by me. [exhales]
Where are you two heading off to?
[sighs] Axel, I'm just helping the lady out.
Nobody's going nowhere. Put the gun down.
-Axel-- -Now!
[Ted] Come on, Axel.
Axel, the mission is over. It's over.
Everything. The woman has a daughter.
translation.ko: 다 끝이야 이 여자한테는 딸이 있대

translation.en: She just wants to find her baby girl.
How are you gonna get out the front door?
-I'm gonna open it for her. -Really?
-The way you did last night? -What?
Somebody opened the front door, Ted.
Somebody disabled those lights. I think it was you.
Bullshit, Axel, a bunch of people here had the codes.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 번호 아는 사람이 한둘이야?

translation.en: A bunch of people have the wrong codes, because I gave you all the wrong codes.
translation.ko: 다들 틀린 번호를 알고 있죠 엉터리로 가르쳐 줬거든요

translation.en: But you knew where I keep the real ones, in my notebook.
translation.ko: 내가 노트에 번호를 써 두는 버릇이 있다는 걸

translation.en: You're the only one that knows that.
All right. Hell, you got me this time.
-No! Stop it. Stop it! -Why are you doing this?
-Why are you doing this? Son of a bitch! -Stop it! Just... stop!
translation.ko: - 왜 이러는 거예요? - 그만, 제발 그만해!

translation.en: -[kid] Hey, what's going on? -[pan clunks]
[Axel] That stupid fucker.
That fucker.
[Ted] I don't care how we do this, but you're coming with me, sweetheart.
translation.ko: 방법은 모르겠지만 당신은 나랑 같이 가야겠어요

translation.en: -Is that right? -I'm afraid so.
Dead or alive, it doesn't really matter.
Stop, Axel. I need to hand her over to them.
translation.ko: 그만둬, 악셀 이 여자를 놈들한테 넘겨야 해

translation.en: -Who? -Them.
I told them you existed, and now I'm gonna show them you do.
translation.ko: 놈들에게 당신 존재를 말했으니 직접 보여 줘야 해

translation.en: Stop! She's different!
They're gonna wanna see this. Maybe then they'll leave us alone.
translation.ko: 그들이 봐야 해 그럼 우릴 내버려 둘 거야

translation.en: They promised me they would let us go!
Stop it! Don't you do it, Axel! Don't you do it!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 그러지 마! 어디 쏘기만 해 봐!

translation.en: If you understood what they did to me, what they did inside of me,
translation.ko: 놈들이 내 몸에 무슨 짓을 했는지 잘 알잖아

translation.en: you'd know why I was taking her back. And I am taking her back.
translation.ko: 왜 데려가려는지 알잖아 꼭 데려가야 해!

translation.en: She's got superpowers now. Great.
[Axel] I'm sure this is all a lot to take in right now.
translation.ko: 당장은 이 상황을 받아들이기 버거울 거예요

translation.en: [Vanessa] Yeah, a little bit.
[Axel] And, well, waking up the way you did...
The world having gone to shit and everything.
[Vanessa] I just need to be alone right now, okay?
[Axel] Yeah, I know. I get that.
Well, if you need to talk or anything, I'll just be out here.
translation.ko: 밖에 있을 테니까 할 말 있거나 뭐 필요하면 불러요

translation.en: No offense, but go fuck yourself.
-Understood. -Good, then go do it.
Hey, you know what, lady? I'm just trying to do my job, okay?
translation.ko: 이봐요 난 내 일을 하는 것뿐이에요

translation.en: -Just trying my very best to protect you! -I don't need protecting!
translation.ko: - 당신을 최대한 보호하는 일요! - 보호 같은 거 필요 없어요

translation.en: -Really? -Yes!
And I will get out of here and find my daughter without your permission!
translation.ko: 그리고 당신이 허락 안 해도 딸 찾으러 나갈 거예요

translation.en: Hey. You're gonna try.
Are you gonna stop me?
I have to. You know that.
Do what you gotta do.
♪ You'll never know, dear How much I love you ♪ ♪ Please don't take my sunshine away ♪
[man] Anybody in there?
Hello?
Anybody?
-Hello? -[metal clunking]
-♪ Please don't take my sunshine away ♪ -Hello?
Is anybody there?
Is there anybody?
Hello?
Help me. Please, please, please.
-Who are you? -[Axel] Jesus Christ.
translation.ko: 누구시죠? - 이럴 수가! - 놈들 중 하나였어요

translation.en: -[woman] He was one of them, I saw him. -[John] He's a goddamn feeder!
translation.ko: - 이럴 수가! - 놈들 중 하나였어요 뱀파이어잖아, 젠장!

translation.en: -[pants] -[kid] Yo, check his eyes, bro.
They're frigging human.
-[John] You did this. -Hey, hey, hey. Easy.
-[John] What the hell are you? -I didn't do anything.
translation.ko: - 대체 정체가 뭐야? - 난 아무 짓도 안 했어요

translation.en: -She turned me. I'm human again. -What?
translation.ko: 저 여자 덕분에 다시 사람이 됐어요

translation.en: Hey, you. Move, I'll blow your goddamn head off.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고요? - 이봐! - 허튼 수작이면 가만 안 둬 - 당신 덕분이라는데 무슨 뜻이죠?

translation.en: [woman] What does he mean, you turned him?
translation.ko: - 허튼 수작이면 가만 안 둬 - 당신 덕분이라는데 무슨 뜻이죠?

translation.en: As soon as I tasted her blood, I...
I could feel again.
